quotes.quote: The one great element in continuing the success of an offensive is maintaining the momentum.
Forward momentum only worked as a strategy if one had correctly identified which way was forward.
Momentum was momentum, whether you found it in music or on the street or in the beat of your own heart.
Sometimes it's very difficult to keep momentum when it's you that you are following.
Build confidence and momentum with each good decision you make from here on out and choose to be inspired.
The momentum of time is always going forward. You cannot repeat what has been done before. You can't go back.
When you find yourself in the thickness of pursuing a goal or dream, stop only to rest. Momentum builds success.
There appears to be momentum towards more and more misunderstandings between religions, a degradation of relations.
The words carry their own momentum. A confession in motion tends to stay in motion. Newton's first law of jealousy.
When we move in a direction that touches our heart, we add to the momentum of deeper purpose that makes us feel more alive.
Prose should have a flow, the forward momentum of a certain energized weight; it should feel like a voice tumbling in your ear.
The stream of thinking has enormous momentum that can easily drag you along with it. Every thought pretends that it matters so much.
The most important thing you can do to achieve your goals is to make sure that as soon as you set them you immediately begin to create momentum.
The momentum now is inevitable. Now it's about each of us individually arranging the furniture of our own mind to deal with what has become inevitable.
When you're that successful, things have a momentum, and at a certain point you can't really tell whether you have created the momentum or it's creating you.
Momentum is your next day's pitcher.
One play can change your momentum forever.
Never surrender to the momentum of mediocrity.
The momentum of the mind can be vexingly, involuntarily capricious.
For any movement to gain momentum, it must start with a small action.
He who is doing his true will is assisted by the momentum of the universe.
Like all books that have that kind of momentum, it starts from word of mouth.
One positive step can put an end to negative momentum. Now is when you can take it.
Keep moving ahead because action creates momentum, which in turn creates unanticipated opportunities.
Momentum and growth are the lifeblood of startups. This is probably in the top three secrets of executing well.
In a good meeting there is a momentum that comes from the spontaneous exchange of fresh ideas and produces extraordinary results. That momentum depends on the freedom permitted the participants.
Momentum solves 80% of your problems.
Sometimes thinking too much can destroy your momentum.
Momentum is whatever your attitude determines it to be.
Momentum is only as good as tomorrow's starting pitcher.
